author: gerard,g.
body: plastic stability theory of geometrically orthotropic plates and cylindrical shells . a linear eighth-order equilibrium differential equation for plastic buckling of geometrically orthotropic thin cylindrical shells is derived .  this equation is used to obtain explicit solutions for long flat plates and wide columns under axial compression and moderate-length cylinders under external pressure, torsion, and axial compression .
title: plastic stability theory of geometrically orthotropic plates and cylindrical shells .
